The fact is, it says DVD in the title, but it is NOT a DVD... it is a CAM. Those who rant that no one should give a bad comment should realize that people are commenting about the fact that the upload is MISREPRESENTED in the title. If the uploader had placed CAM in the title, no one would be complaining.

Wow T.NL.P.K wat ben jij een ongelooflijke zeikstraal zeg... vergeten dat het gratis is, jonkie? Opzouten vrind, noem jezelf geen koning als je nog geen benul hebt van het fundament van de Pirategemeenschap. Klein kind.

PS ik dl deze ook niet, inderdaad een tikje te groot en ik wacht tot er een retailversie van is. Maar dat wil niet zeggen dat ik het werk van NLT niet apprecieer, good on you fellas!

And John Doe? Dude, I am with you all the way, it's better to announce it in the title. But that's for the lazy fuckers who don't wanna have to read. And even if we make it a rule, and demand ALL uppers add full info to the torrentname, then still the little shit has no right to talk that way. I mean, you're speaking English, so I have no idea if you can read Dutch (not intended as an offence, I just don't know if you're from Nl/BE) but the content left by the socalled pirateking would be enough to get him a serious asskicking if he dared say that shit face to face... which I'm assuming he doesn't... so yeah, it's always better to be as complete as possible in the title. But also yeah: it's always best to read the description before going off on a halfassed bitchtrip. No offence to you, of course.

CaptainBeefheart, no I do not read Dutch. While some of the rants are, indeed, annoying... the fact remains that it IS misrepresented as a DVDRip when it is, in fact, NOT a DVDRip nor the quality of one.
I took no offense because I did not go on a rant. I merely stated the facts. I agree that both sides are in the wrong, the UL who misrepresents the uploads AND the posters who were unnecessarily rude..
Why is it tagged as DvD in title, if it's a god damn cam?..
